death_place.zh-cn: 上海市长宁区江苏路284弄安定坊5号
death_place.en: No. 5, Anding Fang, Lane 284, Jiangsu Road, Changning District, Shanghai

description.zh-cn: 中国翻译家、作家、教育家、美术评论家。早年留学法国巴黎大学，翻译了大量法文作品。在文化大革命期间，因不堪忍受红卫兵的批斗和凌辱，与妻子朱梅馥一同自缢身亡。
description.en: A Chinese translator, writer, educator, and art critic. He studied at the University of Paris in his early years and translated numerous French literary works. During the Cultural Revolution, unable to endure the persecution and humiliation by the Red Guards, he committed suicide with his wife, Zhu Meifu.

death_place.zh-cn: 上海市长宁区江苏路284弄安定坊5号
death_place.en: No. 5, Anding Fang, Lane 284, Jiangsu Road, Changning District, Shanghai

description.zh-cn: 傅雷的妻子，在文化大革命期间与丈夫一同遭受迫害，并共同自缢身亡。
description.en: Wife of Fu Lei, she was persecuted alongside her husband during the Cultural Revolution and they committed suicide together.

description.zh-cn: 傅雷的长子，世界著名的钢琴家。1958年在波兰留学期间移居英国，此举在当时被中国大陆视为叛逃，给其父傅雷带来了巨大的政治压力。
description.en: The elder son of Fu Lei, a world-renowned pianist. He moved to the United Kingdom in 1958 while studying in Poland, an act that was considered defection by mainland China at the time and brought immense political pressure on his father, Fu Lei.

description.zh-cn: 傅雷的次子，英语教师。其整理并出版的《傅雷家书》产生了深远的社会影响。
description.en: The younger son of Fu Lei, an English teacher. He compiled and published 'Fu Lei's Family Letters', which has had a profound social impact.

description.zh-cn: 傅雷的父亲，在傅雷4岁时于狱中病故。
description.en: Fu Lei's father, who died in prison when Fu Lei was four years old.

description.zh-cn: 1966年至1976年在中国发生的政治运动。在此期间，傅雷夫妇等大量知识分子和干部遭受残酷迫害。
description.en: A political movement in China from 1966 to 1976. During this period, a large number of intellectuals and officials, including Fu Lei and his wife, were brutally persecuted.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命时期的青年学生准军事组织。傅雷夫妇因遭受红卫兵连续数日的批斗和凌辱而自杀。
description.en: A student-led paramilitary social movement during the Cultural Revolution. Fu Lei and his wife committed suicide after days of struggle sessions and humiliation by the Red Guards.

description.zh-cn: 1957年在中国大陆发起的政治运动。傅雷在此运动的补课阶段被划为“右派分子”。
description.en: A political campaign launched in mainland China in 1957. Fu Lei was labeled a 'Rightist' during a later stage of this movement.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，时任中共上海市委第一书记。在1958年的“反右补课”中，不顾周而复等人的意见，执意将傅雷划为“右派”。
description.en: A Chinese politician, then First Secretary of the Shanghai Municipal Committee of the CCP. In the 1958 'make-up' session of the Anti-Rightist Campaign, he insisted on labeling Fu Lei as a 'Rightist', against the opinions of others like Zhou Erfu.

description.zh-cn: 位于法国巴黎的著名大学，傅雷于1928年在此留学学习艺术理论。
description.en: A renowned university in Paris, France, where Fu Lei studied art theory as a foreign student in 1928.

description.zh-cn: 傅雷与其子傅聪、傅敏的往来家信，后由傅敏整理出版，内容体现了傅雷对儿子的严格教育与深厚父爱，影响深远。
description.en: A collection of correspondence between Fu Lei and his sons Fu Cong and Fu Min. Later compiled and published by Fu Min, the letters reflect Fu Lei's strict upbringing and deep paternal love, and have had a lasting impact.

description.zh-cn: 法国著名作家，傅雷在巴黎留学时深受其影响，并翻译了他的多部著作，如《约翰·克里斯朵夫》。
description.en: A famous French writer who greatly influenced Fu Lei during his studies in Paris. Fu Lei translated many of his works, such as 'Jean-Christophe'.

description.zh-cn: 法国著名作家，傅雷翻译了他的多部名著，如《高老头》和《欧也妮·葛朗台》。
description.en: A famous French writer. Fu Lei translated many of his masterpieces, such as 'Père Goriot' and 'Eugénie Grandet'.

description.zh-cn: 法国启蒙思想家、作家，傅雷翻译了他的《老实人》等小说作品。
description.en: A French Enlightenment writer and philosopher. Fu Lei translated his fictional works such as 'Candide'.

description.zh-cn: 法国作家罗曼·罗兰创作的长篇小说，由傅雷翻译成中文，是其重要的翻译作品之一。
description.en: A novel by French writer Romain Rolland, translated into Chinese by Fu Lei, which is one of his most important translated works.

description.zh-cn: 位于上海的一所艺术学校，傅雷于1931年回国后在此任教，担任办公室主任并教授美术史和法文。
description.en: An art school in Shanghai where Fu Lei taught after returning to China in 1931, serving as the office director and teaching art history and French.

description.zh-cn: 反右运动中产生的政治标签，用于指代被认为反对共产党领导的知识分子和干部。傅雷于1958年被划为右派。
description.en: A political label created during the Anti-Rightist Campaign to denote intellectuals and officials considered to be against the leadership of the Communist Party. Fu Lei was labeled a Rightist in 1958.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物。文化大革命期间，一张褪色的蒋中正旧画报被红卫兵从傅雷家中搜出，成为其“反党罪证”之一。
description.en: A political figure of the Republic of China. During the Cultural Revolution, a faded old pictorial of Chiang Kai-shek was found in Fu Lei's home by Red Guards and used as 'evidence of being anti-Party'.

description.zh-cn: 法兰西共和国派驻中华人民共和国的外交代表机构。于2009年设立了“傅雷翻译出版奖”。
description.en: The diplomatic mission of the French Republic to the People's Republic of China. It established the 'Fu Lei Translation and Publishing Award' in 2009.

en: Fu Lei Translation and Publishing Award

description.zh-cn: 由法国驻华大使馆设立的奖项，旨在促进法语文学在中国的翻译和传播，因纪念翻译家傅雷而得名。
description.en: An award established by the French Embassy in China to promote the translation and dissemination of French literature in China, named in memory of the translator Fu Lei.

description.zh-cn: 傅雷与朱梅馥于1932年结婚，直至1966年9月3日共同自杀身亡。
description.en: Fu Lei and Zhu Meifu were married in 1932 and remained so until their joint suicide on September 3, 1966.

description.zh-cn: 傅聪是傅雷的长子。
description.en: Fu Cong is the elder son of Fu Lei.

description.zh-cn: 傅聪是朱梅馥的长子。
description.en: Fu Cong is the elder son of Zhu Meifu.

description.zh-cn: 傅敏是傅雷的次子。
description.en: Fu Min is the younger son of Fu Lei.

description.zh-cn: 傅敏是朱梅馥的次子。
description.en: Fu Min is the younger son of Zhu Meifu.

description.zh-cn: 傅聪与傅敏是兄弟关系。
description.en: Fu Cong and Fu Min are brothers.

description.zh-cn: 傅雷是傅鹏飞的儿子，其父在他幼年时去世。
description.en: Fu Lei is the son of Fu Pengfei, who passed away during Fu Lei's childhood.

description.zh-cn: 在文化大革命初期，傅雷遭受红卫兵的残酷迫害和凌辱，最终导致他与妻子一同自杀。
description.en: In the early stages of the Cultural Revolution, Fu Lei was subjected to brutal persecution and humiliation by the Red Guards, which ultimately led him and his wife to commit suicide.

description.zh-cn: 在文化大革命初期，朱梅馥与丈夫傅雷一同遭受红卫兵的残酷迫害和凌辱，最终共同自杀。
description.en: In the early stages of the Cultural Revolution, Zhu Meifu, along with her husband Fu Lei, was subjected to brutal persecution and humiliation by the Red Guards, which ultimately led them to commit suicide together.

description.zh-cn: 红卫兵对傅雷进行了连续四天三夜的抄家和批斗，包括罚跪、戴高帽等凌辱，并搜出所谓“反党罪证”，是导致其自杀的直接原因。
description.en: The Red Guards ransacked Fu Lei's home and subjected him to struggle sessions for four days and three nights, including humiliations like forced kneeling and wearing a dunce cap. They found so-called 'anti-Party evidence,' which were the direct cause of his suicide.

description.zh-cn: 傅雷在1958年的“反右补课”中被划为“右派分子”，遭受政治迫害。
description.en: Fu Lei was labeled a 'Rightist' during the 1958 'make-up' session of the Anti-Rightist Campaign and was politically persecuted.

description.zh-cn: 傅雷在1958年被划为右派，直到1961年9月才被“摘帽”。
description.en: Fu Lei was designated a Rightist in 1958 and the label was not removed until September 1961.

description.zh-cn: 时任上海最高领导的柯庆施推翻了下级“可划可不划”的意见，拍板将傅雷定为“右派”。
description.en: Ke Qingshi, then the top leader in Shanghai, overruled his subordinates' opinion that Fu Lei was a borderline case and made the final decision to label him a 'Rightist'.

description.zh-cn: 1958年傅聪出走英国，此事在当时被视为叛逃，给傅雷带来了巨大的政治压力，傅雷在遗书中写道“光是教育出一个叛徒傅聪来，在人民面前已经死有余辜了”。
description.en: Fu Cong's departure to the UK in 1958 was considered defection and brought immense political pressure on Fu Lei. In his suicide note, Fu Lei wrote, 'Just for educating a traitor like Fu Cong, I already deserve to die in the eyes of the people'.

description.zh-cn: 傅雷于1928年至1931年在巴黎大学留学，学习艺术理论。
description.en: Fu Lei studied art theory at the University of Paris from 1928 to 1931.

description.zh-cn: 傅敏整理并促成了《傅雷家书》的出版。
description.en: Fu Min compiled and facilitated the publication of 'Fu Lei's Family Letters'.

description.zh-cn: 傅雷在巴黎留学期间开始受罗曼·罗兰影响，热爱音乐，并翻译其作品。
description.en: During his studies in Paris starting in 1928, Fu Lei was influenced by Romain Rolland, developed a love for music, and translated his works.

description.zh-cn: 傅雷翻译了罗曼·罗兰的名著《约翰·克里斯朵夫》，该译本影响深远。
description.en: Fu Lei translated Romain Rolland's masterpiece 'Jean-Christophe', and his translation has been highly influential.

position.zh-cn: 校办公室主任、美术史及法文教师
position.en: Office Director, Art History and French Language Teacher

description.zh-cn: 1931年回国后，傅雷在上海美术专科学校任教。
description.en: After returning to China in 1931, Fu Lei taught at the Shanghai Art School.

description.zh-cn: 法国驻华大使馆于2009年设立了“傅雷翻译出版奖”。
description.en: The French Embassy in China established the 'Fu Lei Translation and Publishing Award' in 2009.

description.zh-cn: “傅雷翻译出版奖”为纪念傅雷而设立并以其名字命名。
description.en: The 'Fu Lei Translation and Publishing Award' was established in memory of Fu Lei and is named after him.
